book.title: Slow Burn
book.description: 简介： Tell 'em to look sharp, Bert. This pickup's got to be good. Kevin Morrow gulped the last of his coffee and felt its bitter acid gurgle around his stomach. He stared moodily through the plastic port where the spangled skirt of stars glittered against...
